author: Vladimir Barbarosh <vladimir.barbarosh@gmail.com> (https://github.com/vbarbarosh)
name: @vbarbarosh/smcss
description: A way to organize and write CSS

scripts.build: rm -rf build && sass demos/demo.sass | postcss -o demos/demo.css && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && sass demos/sm.sass | postcss -o dist/sm.css && cp reset/reset.css dist/reset.css
